txt.en:
'When you were first made known to me, I did not expect such devotion to the Zhélruka cause, [placeholder]. Not long ago, there was much strife between all those in the Grey Mountains, but you have worked to dispel some of it. You have exceeded my expectations in every respect, and are a true friend to the Zhélruka Clan.

'But more than that, you are a trusted advisor to me! As my people and I journeyed, some wondered if we would ever find a home, and if Gundabad would ever again open its doors to us. My certainty never wavered. There will come a day when all the halls of Gundabad ring with the sound of dwarves at work, and my part in it will be my greatest accomplishment.

'You are always welcome in these halls, [placeholder]! Go forth and seek glory and treasure worthy of your name, your tale, and your allies: the Zhélruka Clan!'
Vérnozal can be found in Máttugard, by the Steepset.\n\nYou should collect wares and provisions for the feast.
'The reclamation of Gundabad is going well, thanks in part to your efforts.'
Vérnozal can be found in Máttugard, by the Steepset.\n\nPrince Ingór wishes to talk to you.
There is no twist in this Mission.
'You are always welcome in these halls.'

'Ah, very good!

'Did I mention our special guests? No? Well, we do have some special guests joining us for the feast. They have only just arrived at Gundabad, but you will see them soon enough.'

'Now, let us begin the feast!'
You have pledged to lend your aid and your adventuring skills to the Zhélruka and to fight on their behalf in Gundabad.

'[placeholder], there you are! The reclamation of Gundabad is going well, thanks in part to your efforts assisting the Zhélruka. Let us rest and celebrate our successes!\n\n'I ask but one more task of you. Would you gather food and wares for the feast? I will have the best Zhélruka cooks prepare a feast most filling!'
Vérnozal can be found in Máttugard, by the Steepset.\n\nPrince Ingór wishes to talk to you.
